这插件有2个问题。如图
第一个谁都进不去，第二只有op进得去，版本是1.7。10的，插件版本有点老
但是我换了最新的，直接不用输入密码啥的就直接进去了

replies.author: shend2002
replies.txt_content:
Config.yml文件 修改 
Protection:
    # Enable some servers protection ( country based login, antibot )
    enableProtection: false
    # Countries allowed to join the server and register, see http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plu ... es/countries-codes/ for countries' codes
    # PLEASE USE QUOTES!
    countries:
    - 'US'
    - 'GB'
    # Countries blacklisted automatically (without any needed to enable protection)
    # PLEASE USE QUOTES!
    countriesBlacklist:
    # Do we need to enable automatic antibot system?
    enableAntiBot: false
    # Max number of player allowed to login in 5 secs before enable AntiBot system automatically
    antiBotSensibility: 10
    # Duration in minutes of the antibot automatic system
    antiBotDuration: 10
